search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Podium (podium.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Podium is: [https://www.podium.com/pricing/](https://www.podium.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.
